Button **FAITH Over Fear May 20, 2025 PREP ACT – Threat to Medical Freedom and Basis of Medical Martial Law under COVID.** May 20PREP ACT – Threat to Medical Freedom and Basis of Medical Martial Law under COVID.Speakers: Dr. Vliet and Major Gary will discuss what the PREP ACT is and the importance of national efforts underway to repeal it. **Post Navigation** **You may also like...** **Legal
